steps.name: Read Source Code File
steps.description: Read the source code file from the specified file path.

inputs.file_path: The path to the source code file.

steps.name: Lint Code
steps.description: Analyze the source code for linting issues using a code linter.

inputs.code: The source code to be linted.

steps.name: Summarize Linting Issues
steps.description: Generate a concise summary of the linting issues found, limited to 30 words.

inputs.text: The linting issues found in the code.
inputs.max_words: Maximum number of words for the summary (30).

steps.name: Generate Final Report
steps.description: Create a final report containing the title, source code length, linting issues, and summary.

inputs.title: Title of the report, including the file path.
inputs.data: Combined data including source length, linting issues, and summary.
